column5: I am going to try and built a light weight trailer for hauling my 12ft. aluminum into back lakes with my atv. Does anyone have such  thing or suggestions . Thanks Mike

I have a trailer for doing exactly that but no boat yet.It is a simple square frame and the axle has 14 inches of clearance to the ground.I added removeable sides and ends so it can be used for a box trailer as well.Its a little wider than my atv and maybe just a tad to heavy but it will take some abuse without breaking.  vance
A princess auto trailer would fall apart about halfway in to said back lake, however, they do have most of the supplies you'd need.  S.
You can pick up a cheap 4x8 utility trailer on kijiji for about $200.
Thanks for the help guys, Great site
Let me clarify, since the OP wants to build a trailer, Princess Auto carries everything you need to build one.
